favourite.article: God's love is unchangeable. His love is the DEEPEST in the WORLD!!!!!!
God's love is everything that we need. He loves us so much, beyond our imagination. This is true love so let make use of it. Thank you.

I like the last part "God's love is brighter than the brightest star That shines every night above; And there is nothing in this world That can ever change His love."
In our experience I believe God's love is really bright and His love keep shining on us everyday when we turn to our inner man. Praise the Lord for His great LOVE...
Too many people like to put God in a box. God's love is deeper than we can ever imagine.
I love this song. My favorite line is "God's love can find all those from sea to sea". I sing it all the time in the children's meeting.
